display_information.name: Flavorpheus
display_information.long_description: run /cook to start a meeting in flavortown. Currently this is euans bot and the code is private. It has no scopes beyond slash commands. the art is by Eleeza :) It just invites people to join you in a room with a JITSI instance

slash_commands.usage_hint: use /cook to generate a meeting in flavortown

slash_commands.description: creates an invite to the users house in flavortown
slash_commands.usage_hint: use to publicly share an invite to your flavor town home
